text: “Ndipo Ayuda ndi Akhrisitu sangakondwere nawe pokhapokha utatsatira chipembedzo chawo. Nena: “Ndithudi, chiongoko cha Allah ndichomwe chili chiongoko chenicheni.” Ngati utsata zilakolako zawo pambuyo pa zomwe zakudzera, monga kuzindikira (kwenikweni), sudzapeza mtetezi aliyense ngakhale mthandizi kwa Allah
